full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement Notification

## Tender Title

* English: 9F045-220386 - Aerosol Limb Imager (ALI)
* French: 9F045-220386 - Imageur des aérosols du limbe atmosphérique (Aérolimbe)

## Solicitation Information
* Reference Number: WS4098055841-Doc4105065689
* Solicitation Number: WS4098055841
* Publication Date: 2023-07-26
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-21T14:00:00

## Amendment Information
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: 2023-09-13

## Tender Details
* UNSPSC Code: 81102302
* UNSPSC Description: Space Engineering Services
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Technical Merit within a Stipulated Maximum Budget

## Important Information
* Tender Status: Expired
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* Contact Information:
  * Name: Gianni Barreca (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: gianni.barreca@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16989445?extsite=MTY5ODk0NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Additional Details
* Region of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR)
* No Limitations on Tendering

### Tender Cancellation Warning
**TENDERS WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED**
This tender has expired on 2023-09-21T14:00:00. No further submissions will be accepted.

By following the guidelines and requirements outlined in this tender announcement, potential contractors can familiarize themselves with the acquisition objectives and begin planning their submissions. [1]

[1] The Ariba Discovery website contains essential information regarding the tender process and all required documentation.

Note: Please remove any currency units.

The original contractor shared with you the webpage with the announcement details (see above).
